mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(admin_code, notice_level, notice_title, notice_content) VALUES(#{admin_code}, #{notice_level}, #{notice_title}, #{notice_content})
mapper.select: SELECT notice_code, notice_title, notice_writedate FROM notice ORDER BY notice_level
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET notice_level=#{notice_level}, notice_title=#{notice_title}, notice_content=#{notice_content} WHERE notice_code=#{notice_code}
